summary: At the very beginning, right after character creation.
descriptionHtml:
Aerin, left blind after witnessing the death of his daughter by a Destruction Mage, stumbled into the land of Skyrim to find his daughters killer. Soon after entering Skyrim he was caught in a ambush meant for Ulfric Stormcloak and his men. 

Now, his destiny is in your hands, How will YOU help him exact his revenge?   

[Aerin - level 1 Redguard Male]

You will need this mod to get the same result as the screenshot.
XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement
^[http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]^
author: spike1919
